description: The Ledge Shorts are perfect for both climbing and hiking. The robust 4-way stretch material is lightweight and comfortable – ideal for warm days in the great outdoors or sessions in the climbing gym. The material provides optimum freedom of movement and wicks moisture away from the skin. Clever details offer practical benefits: a zipper leg pocket to hold your valuables and an adjustable waistband for a comfortable fit.
name: Mammut Ledge Shorts - Mens
